title: Virgilio’s Energy-Based Techniques and Prof. Erminio di Pisa's Instant Healing
first_phrase: In the previous text, we explored the energy-based techniques of Virgilio, which are now a crucial component of many courses. Virgilio's techniques help people feel better, filled with energy, and achieve their goals. In this last part, we will delve into the life and work of Prof. Erminio di Pisa, a well-known personality with exceptional charm, energy, and expertise in instant hypnosis and healing. He has hypnotized over 250,000 people and gained recognition through his numerous parapsychic exploits, including distance paranormal healing and announcing horse racing results before they even started. He kindly welcomed us at his Milan residence, and we can't wait to share his fascinating insights with you.
content: Therein, he carried out experiments which drew a large crowd of people interested in them. He chaired the Astrological Association of the Light since 1973, and acted as director of the Centre of Instant Hypnosis. At the age of 14, he fully devoted himself to the study of hypnotic techniques. He has hypnotized more than 250.000 persons. For several years, both the Italian state-owned radio and television have shown us his parapsychic exploits: Collective hypnosis of a theatre audience, distance paranormal healing, announcing the final result of the “Corsa Tris”, a horseracing event, fifteen minutes before it even started, and so on. He was a very expansive person, full of energy. His residence was in Milan, close to Corso Sempione, in the heart of that city. He consented to our visit after merely making a phone call to him.
last_phrase: In summary, his incredible career in hypnosis and parapsychics left a lasting impact on Italy and beyond. He drew large crowds, chaired the Astrological Association of the Light, and even pioneered the use of hypnosis in medical procedures. His accessible and energetic personality allowed him to connect with curious young people and doctors alike. His legacy continues to inspire those interested in the study of hypnosis and magnetism.
